actions.text: Referred jointly to Senate Committees on Appropriations; Banking; Budget to be reported by the Committee on Appropriations, pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority to carry out the congregate services program under title IV of the Housing and Community Development Amendments of 1978.

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed deferral of budget authority (deferral no. 81-70) to carry out the congregate services program under the Housing Community Development Amendments of 1978, as transmitted by the President to the Congress on February 17, 1981, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority to carry out the congregate services program under title IV of the Housing and Community Development Amendments of 1978.
